dictionary.title: Personal Dictionary
dictionary.subtitle: Add specialized terms, brand names, or abbreviations to improve accuracy
dictionary.addPlaceholder: Add terms (comma-separated, e.g. Kubernetes, gRPC, OpenType)
dictionary.noTermsHint: Words here help the AI spell domain-specific vocabulary correctly
dictionary.howItWorksDesc: Dictionary terms are injected into the LLM context during post-processing. This helps correctly spell brand names, technical jargon, abbreviations, and domain-specific vocabulary that standard speech recognition might miss.

feedback.title: Feedback & Help
feedback.subtitle: Report issues, suggest features, or get help
feedback.accuracyPlaceholder: Describe what was transcribed incorrectly and what you expected...
feedback.featurePlaceholder: Describe the feature you would like to see...
feedback.bugPlaceholder: Describe the bug and steps to reproduce...
feedback.helpA1: Click the microphone button on the Dashboard, or press Ctrl+Shift+Space anywhere on your system.
feedback.helpQ2: How do I configure API keys?
feedback.helpA2: Go to Settings → API Providers and enter your SiliconFlow, OpenRouter, or OpenAI API key.
feedback.helpA3: Try adding specialized terms to your Personal Dictionary. Also ensure you're using a good microphone and speaking clearly.
feedback.helpA4: Currently, OpenType requires an internet connection for STT and LLM APIs. Local model support is planned.

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure API providers, models, and preferences

general.launchDesc: Automatically start OpenType when you log in
general.toggle: Toggle (press to start / press to stop)
general.inputModeHint: Toggle mode: press hotkey once to start, once to stop. Push-to-Talk: hold the key to record.
general.outputModeHint: 'Type at cursor' simulates keyboard input at the current cursor position. 'Copy to clipboard' copies the result for you to paste.

hotkey.description: Click on a field and press your desired key combination to set a shortcut.
hotkey.pushToTalkHint: Hold this key to record (only in push-to-talk mode)
hotkey.pasteLastHint: Quickly paste the most recent transcription result

audio.micHint: Select your preferred microphone. Leave empty to use the system default.
audio.startSoundDesc: Play a sound when recording begins
audio.endSoundDesc: Play a sound when recording ends
audio.whisperDesc: Increased sensitivity for quiet environments — speak softly and still be heard

personalization.enableDesc: OpenType will learn your speech patterns, vocabulary preferences, and expression habits over time
personalization.keepUsing: Keep using OpenType to improve accuracy.
personalization.gettingBetter: Getting better at matching your style.
personalization.knowsWell: OpenType knows your communication style well.
personalization.resetHint: This will reset the match score and word count but keep your style preferences.

tones.description: Define how OpenType adjusts output tone based on the active application. When you dictate in a matched app, the LLM adapts its writing style automatically.

language.uiLanguageHint: Choose the language for the application interface
language.voiceInputHint: Auto-detect works well for most languages. Set manually for improved accuracy.
language.textOutputHint: Set a different language to enable real-time translation (e.g., speak Chinese → output English)
language.multiLangDesc: Allow mixing multiple languages in a single dictation. The AI will handle code-switching automatically.
language.translationModeDesc: When input and output languages differ, OpenType performs real-time translation. The output uses natural, idiomatic phrasing — not mechanical word-for-word translation.

privacy.privacyDesc: OpenType stores all dictation history locally on your device. Audio is processed via API calls but is never stored by the service providers. We do not use your data to train any models.
privacy.saveHistoryDesc: When enabled, all transcriptions are saved locally for review
privacy.retentionHint: Older entries are automatically removed based on this setting
privacy.clearAllHint: Deletes all history, personal dictionary entries, and learned preferences from this device.
privacy.clearConfirm: Clear all local data? This cannot be undone.

advanced.description: Fine-tune the AI post-processing pipeline. Each feature can be individually enabled or disabled.
advanced.fillerDesc: Automatically remove "um", "uh", "like", "you know", "那个", "嗯" and other meaningless fillers
advanced.repetitionDesc: Detect and remove unintentional word/phrase repetitions (e.g., "I I want" → "I want")
advanced.selfCorrectionDesc: Recognize mid-sentence corrections (e.g., "Monday—no, Tuesday") and keep only the final intent
advanced.autoFormatDesc: Add punctuation, capitalization, and organize spoken lists into structured text
advanced.noteDesc: Disabling these features means the LLM will do less post-processing. The output will be closer to raw transcription. Self-correction detection is the most impactful feature for natural dictation.
